mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (memail, mnickname, mpw, maddress, mphone, mauthority, mlikecount, mdeleted, mregdate, mmoddate) values (#{memail}, #{mnickname}, #{mpw}, #{maddress}, #{mphone}, #{mauthority}, #{mlikecount}, #{mdeleted}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update tbl_member set mnickname = #{mnickname}, mpw = #{mpw}, maddress = #{maddress}, mphone = #{mphone}, mauthority = #{mauthority} where mno = #{mno}
